name: Guilelessâ€™ Guide Vol. I
entries: This guide contains self-help tricks on improving your charisma and social standing.
It can be read over 1 week to grant a creature a 10% discount to one purchase in downtime, provided it is an object of the same or lower rarity as this tome.
Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their General Store, Stablehand, or Taxi/Landlord Wage Progression by 1.
Once this book has been used in this way 2 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
